article.headline: Custom Standards Test
article.content: Testing article with custom quality standards.

quality_rules.description: Article should maintain professional AP-style tone
quality_rules.validation_prompt: Does this article maintain a professional, AP-style journalistic tone without sensationalism?

quality_rules.description: Content must be team-focused without excessive opponent coverage
quality_rules.validation_prompt: Is this article primarily focused on the specified team rather than their opponents?

quality_rules.description: No speculation about future events or outcomes
quality_rules.validation_prompt: Does this article avoid speculation about future games, playoff scenarios, or potential outcomes?

quality_rules.description: Focus on recent developments and current season
quality_rules.validation_prompt: Does this article focus on recent games and current season developments rather than historical comparisons?
